title: Digital Finance Forum: Stories of digital transformation, achievements and challenges
desc: In the 5th edition of the Digital Finance Forum, our Partner Hernán Gutsztat was invited to participate in the panel 'Stories of digital transformation, achievements and challenges'.

title: UPL panel at Expo Agro 2023: Sustainability from all fields
desc: Our Partner Hernán Gutsztat was invited by UPL to participate in this panel alongside leading experts in innovation in the Agro industry.

title: Interview with Hernán Gutsztat on '5días Televisión'
desc: Our Partner Hernán Gutsztat was interviewed by Nadia Servián in '5días Televisión', one of the most important TV networks in Paraguay, where he discussed the importance of investing in digital transformation.

title: Ceibo Talks: Hyper-personalization, a data-driven approach
desc: We invited Mauricio Valdez Mendía, current Chief Transformation & Digital Officer of Microsoft for Walmart LATAM, to talk about the importance of having a Hyper-personalization strategy and how organizations can implement it.

speakers.name: Mauricio Valdez Mendía
speakers.position: Chief Transformation & Digital Officer of Microsoft at Walmart LATAM & former Chief Data Officer at Up Sí Vale, El Puerto de Liverpool and Gentera

title: All you need to know about NFTs
desc: Connie Ansaldi and Nicolas Balestrini, experts in NFTs and Blockchain, joined us in this webinar to answer all the important questions about Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs).

title: Great Talk: Leadership in agile teams
desc: We participated in the Great Talk 'Leadership in agile teams' of Great Place to Work® Argentina, where we talked about the importance of building a strong workspace culture in agile and dynamic teams.

title: New rules for banking in Latin America
desc: Join this webinar where our Managing Partner analyzes how banks are responding to Fintech and BigTech’s disruption in the financial market. Are they competition or allies?

title: How did Ceibo Digital succeed in getting its employees to build the company’s brand?
desc: Hernán Gutsztat, Ceibo’s Managing Partner, talks to Khris Olivero, GPTW consultant, about the foundations that build our team and our company.

title: Aapresid Congress: myths and truths about agricultural transformation
desc: Our Partner, David Wilson, was invited to participate in Aapresid's 2021 Congress. In this webinar, he discusses myths and truths about agricultural transformation.

title: The importance of the 'Contactability Policy'
desc: David Wilson, Partner at Ceibo Digital, explains how a proper Contactability Policy helps to define a clear governance and automate the management of campaigns between the different departments.
